justification: Ignores Team B’s preferences and situation: B values dual-threat QBs and immediate upside at 0-8; Jones fits that, Flores doesn’t. B already has strong RB depth, so a Tier-4 RB adds little. The “tough playoff” angle helps A, not B. The swap is mechanically feasible (QB-for-QB plus RB) but misaligned with B’s incentives. Rationale is terse and A-centric with minimal evidence.
